Name: 快乐小家 Home Sick
About the game: What is this game: The story is about staying alive in a mystery house. You are the main character, who is an ordinary person living everyday life, but one day after awaking in the morning, Although the house is normal but strange things are happening. And when the night is close, you will get evil's attention, if you are not fully prepared, you will turn into its meal... Survive all four nights, and through the ending, you may discover what this is all about. GamePlay: This game contains puzzle-solving and action elements. Players should be able to interact with scene objects, find clues, collect weapons, and set up traps to kill monsters.
